text: allaah ne vachan[1] diya hai unhen, jo tumamen se eemaan laayen tatha sukarm karen ki unhen avashy dharatee mein adhikaar pradaan karega, jaise unhen adhikaar pradaan kiya, jo inase pahale the tatha avashy sudrdh kar dega unake us dharm ko, jise unake lie pasand kiya hai tatha un (kee dasha) ko unake bhay ke pashchaat shaanti mein badal dega, vah meree ibaadat (vandana) karate rahen aur kisee cheez ko mera saajhee na banaayen aur jo kufr karen isake pashchaat, to vahee ullanghanakaaree hain
